data.text: Pen kɨdek won anɨb ak, Jisas ñɨg cheb Galili pɨs adaŋ amnak. Ñɨg cheb Galili anɨb ak, yɨb olap Taybeliyas agelɨgɨpal.
Pen ne binɨb mɨñak gup okok, kɨlop gek suŋ lolɨgup. Suŋ lek tap mageptek anɨb okok nɨgɨlak tek, binɨb kuŋay yɨbɨl nop kɨdek gelɨgɨpal.
Anɨgelak, Jisas bɨne okok ayɨp am dum olap besɨg yelak.
6.4 Jon 2.13 Pen ñɨn nab anɨb ak, Juda ñɨn awl Pasopa apal ak wulep wulep gak.

6.5 Mat 14.14, Mak 6.34, Luk 9.12 Besɨg mɨdɨlɨg nɨgak, binɨb kuŋay yɨbɨl nop nɨgɨnɨg apelak. Nɨŋɨd, tɨtay gɨnɨgab ak ke nɨgak ak pen, bɨne Pilip tɨtay agɨnɨgab agɨl, nop agak, Chɨn tap mɨdup akal nɨb tawɨl, binɨb okok kɨlop ñon ñɨŋɨnɨgabal agak.
Agek Pilip pen agak, Chɨn kab mɨdup 2006.7 Kab mɨdup olap, mɨñɨl tawep tek mɨdeb. dad amɨl, tap mɨdup taw dad apɨl tɨpag sɨkol sɨkol gɨl, mɨdupsek ñon ñɨŋɨnɨgel tek ma lɨnɨgab agak.
Anɨb agek, Jisas bɨne olap yɨb ne Edlu, Saymon Pita nɨmam ne ak, ne agak,
6.9 2 Kin 4.43 Ñɨsɨkol olap, bali dɨl gɨpal bilet anep mamɨd ak, kubsal omɨŋal sek dɨ mɨdeb awl ak pen, binɨb kuŋay yɨbɨl mɨdebal, ak tap awl mel agak.

Agek Jisas agak, Binɨb okok agem, besɨgɨlaŋ agak. Anɨb agek, bɨne okok binɨb okok kɨlop agelak, tap wɨjwɨj kuŋay yek ak adek anɨb okok besɨgɨlak. Binɨb kuŋay yɨbɨl anɨb okok, bɨ okok nep, 5,000 tek amnak.
Kɨli anɨgɨl besɨgɨlaknɨŋ, Jisas bilet ak dɨl, God nop tep agɨl, kɨlop bɨlok ñak. Kubsal ak abe gak. Kɨlop anɨgɨl bɨlok ñek, ñɨb gel gel yɨlɨk gek day kelɨgɨlak.
Anɨgel, bɨne okok kɨlop agak, Tap ñɨbɨl kelɨgɨpal okok, dad am ap ma gep agak.
Agek, bɨne okok bilet dayday yepɨlɨg wad yɨgel yɨgel, wad anep umɨgan ak aplan jakak. Bilet anep mamɨd anɨb ak, binɨb ñɨbɨl kelɨgɨlak ak yɨgɨlak.
Binɨb okok tap mageptek gak anɨb ak nɨŋɨd anɨb agɨlak, Nɨŋɨd apun, bɨ nɨm awl, bɨ God gos ñek agñeb ak, God ned agak, Nop agyoken lum awl ownɨgab agak agɨlak.

6.15 Mat 14.23, Jon 18.36 Anɨb agɨlak, Jisas takaw kɨli ak nɨŋɨd gos nɨgak, binɨb okok nop ap kɨles gɨl don, gapman bɨnonɨm chɨn mɨdeŋ agɨnɨgel. Anɨb ak nɨŋɨd, ne tep alaŋ amɨl, dum okok ke awsek yek.
Pen dugep won ak, Jisas bɨne okok kɨli ñɨg cheb ayaŋ amɨl,
bot dɨl taun Kapeneyam amnɨg saŋɨdɨlak. Amel amel kɨsɨlɨm apek, kɨli mɨdelak ak Jisas ne ma owak.
Kɨli amnɨlaknɨŋ, yɨgen awl dɨl, ñɨg ak pagak.
Pen man pal awl nab ak amjakɨlak ak, tapɨn nep gɨ dad ñɨg nab sɨŋak amɨlɨg nɨgɨlak, Jisas ñɨg wɨj adek ak tawɨd wulep sɨŋak apjakek, nɨŋɨd pɨlɨkɨlak.
Pɨlɨkelak kɨlop agak, Ma pɨlɨkɨnɨmɨb. Ak yad nep agak.
Anɨb agek, ma pɨlɨkɨl nop bot mɨgan agel amnaknɨŋ, man wakay amnɨg gelak ak won anɨb ak nep amjakɨlak.
Mɨnek binɨb ñɨg cheb pɨs adaŋ yelak okok, kɨli mɨdɨl nɨgɨlak, tolil bot nokom dɨl owlak ak, bɨne okok nep dɨl amel, Jisas ayɨp ma amnɨlak.
6.23 Jon 6.11 Pen bot ogɨnap sek taun Taybeliyas nɨb apɨl, Bɨawl ne God nop tep agɨl tap ñek ñɨŋɨlak tep ak wulep owlak.
Apel, binɨb kɨli nɨŋɨd anɨgɨl nɨgɨlak, Jisas ayɨp bɨne ayɨp ma yelak. Anɨb ak tek, nop nɨgun agɨl, bot anɨb okok dɨl taun Kapeneyam amɨl nop pɨyowɨlak.
Binɨb anɨb okok, kɨli ñɨg cheb pɨs awl ak apɨl Jisas yɨl amjakɨl, nop nɨŋɨd anɨb agɨlak, Tisa, nad won akal awl opan agɨlak?
6.26 Jon 6.11-12 Agel Jisas pen agak, Nɨbop nɨŋɨd yɨbɨl agebin agak. Tap mageptek gɨpin anep nɨŋɨd yɨp ma pɨyow ajebɨkep agak. Tap mɨdup ñen ñɨbɨl nab ayaŋ lɨpɨm anɨb ak nɨŋɨd, yɨp pɨyow ajebɨm agak.

6.27 Mat 3.17, Luk 3.22, Jon 1.33, 4.14, 6.48-58, Apo 2.22, 2 Pi 1.17 Tap mɨdup kuy gɨnɨgab ak, pɨyow ajebɨm ak ma gɨnɨmɨb agak. Tap mɨdup pel mɨdep ak pen, tap anɨb ak gek binɨb pel pelnep yenɨgabal ak, pɨyow ajebɨm ak gɨnɨmɨb agak. Tap mɨdup anɨb ak, Bɨ Olap Ñɨne nɨbop ñɨnɨgab agak. Bapi God ne bɨ anɨb anop, bɨyad yɨbɨl agɨl ayɨp yek ak nɨm, tap anɨgɨl ñɨnɨgab agak.
Anɨb agek nop agnɨŋɨd agɨlak, God wog ne okok gɨtep gɨnɨgun agɨl, taydɨl gɨnɨgun agɨlak?
6.29 1 Jo 3.23 Agelak Jisas pen agak, God wog ne gɨnɨgab anɨb ak nɨm, God bɨ agyokek owak ak, nop nokom gos lɨnɨgɨnɨmɨb agak.
Anɨb agek agɨlak, Nad chɨnop tap mageptek olap ge nɨŋɨd, nep nokom gos lɨnɨgɨnɨgun agɨlak. Anɨb ak chɨnop tap tay tek gɨnɨgaban agɨlak?

Apɨs based sɨkop bɨlel, man nep binɨb ma yelak nab okok mɨdɨl, tap ñɨŋeb olap, bilet Mana6.31 Tap ñɨŋeb olap, bilet Mana apal ak, God ne tap ñɨŋeb anɨb ak bɨlel Yislel binɨb kɨlop ñak. Kɨli man Yijip kelɨgɨl, man nep binɨb ma yelak nab okok ajelɨgɨpal ñɨn ak, God tap ñɨŋeb bilet Mana anɨb ak kɨlop ñolɨgup. Pen Kisim Bek sapta 16 ayɨp Buk Song sapta 78 lain 24 nɨgɨnɨmɨb. apal ak ñɨbelɨgɨpal agɨlak. Anɨgɨlak takaw anɨb ak, buk Baybol ak ñu kɨl tɨkɨl agak, Ne kɨlop tap mɨdup God man ne alaŋ nɨb ak ñek ñɨbelɨgɨpal agɨl tɨkak agɨlak.

Anɨb agelak, Jisas kɨlop agak, Nɨbop nɨŋɨd yɨbɨl agebin agak. Tap mɨdup God man ne alaŋ nɨb ak, bɨ Mosis nɨbop ma ñak agak. Mel agak. Bapi yad pen, ne tap mɨdup God man ne alaŋ nɨb tap mɨdup nɨŋɨd yɨbɨl ak, nɨbop ñub agak.
Tap mɨdup ñub agebin anɨb ak, God man ne alaŋ nɨb owup agak. God man ne alaŋ kelɨgɨl lum ayaŋ apɨl, binɨb lum awl okok kɨlop gek pelpel mɨdtep gebal agak.
6.34 Jon 4.14-15, 6.48-58, 7.37 Agek nop agɨlak, Bɨawl, tap mɨdup anɨb ak chɨnop pelnep ñɨlɨg yenɨmɨn agɨlak.
Agelak kɨlop agak, Yad nokom nɨm, tap mɨdup ñɨbɨl pel yenɨgabal ak agak. Binɨb yɨp yɨl ownɨgab ak, tepayaŋ yuwan ma gɨnɨgab agak. Pen yɨp gos lɨnɨgɨnɨgab ak, ñɨg nen tepayaŋ ma gɨnɨgab agak.
6.36 Jon 6.26, 6.64, 20.29 Pen nɨbop apin tek, yɨp wɨdɨn nepɨm ak pen, gos ma lɨnɨgebɨm agak.
6.37 Mat 11.28, Jon 10.28-29, 17.6-8, 2 Ti 2.19, 1 Jo 2.19 Bapi binɨb yɨp agɨnɨgab okok, yɨp yɨl ownɨgabal agak. Pen binɨb an yɨp yɨl ownɨgab ak, nop ma yɨbɨl dɨyokɨnɨm agak.
6.38 Mat 26.39, Jon 4.34, 5.30 Yad God man ne alaŋ nɨb ownek ak, ke nepin tek gin agɨl ma ownek agak. Bɨ yɨp agyokek ownek ak, gos ne ke nɨgup tek gin agɨl ownek agak.

6.39 Jon 10.28-29, 17.12, 18.9 Pen bɨ yɨp agyokak ak, gos ne nɨgup anɨb ak nep nɨm, binɨb yɨp agup okok nɨg mɨden, olap ma kul gɨnɨmuŋ agak. Ñɨn kɨdek ak pen apek, mɨdupsek gen tepayaŋ tɨkjakɨnɨgel agak.

6.40 Jon 3.15, 6.27, 6.47, 6.54, 11.24 Bapi ne anɨgɨl gos nɨgup, binɨb Ñɨne nop nɨŋɨd gos lɨnɨgɨnɨgabal okok, kɨli pel pelnep yenɨgel agak. Anɨb ak ñɨn kɨdek ak apek, kɨlop gen tepayaŋ tɨkjakɨnɨgabal agak.
Pen Jisas takaw anɨb agak, Yad nokom nɨm, tap mɨdup God man ne alaŋ nɨb owup ak agek, Juda bɨawl okok kɨli pomɨl agɨlɨg agɨlak.
6.42 Mat 13.55, Mak 6.3, Luk 4.22 Pen anɨb agɨlak, Bɨ nɨm awl Josep ñɨne Jisas nep tek agɨlak? Nonɨm nap ne ak chɨn nopun agɨlak. Anɨb ak taydɨl pen, God man ne alaŋ nɨb opin agup ak agɨlak?
Anɨb agelak, ne pen agak, Pomɨl agebɨm ak kelɨgɨnɨmɨb agak.
6.44 Jon 6.65 Binɨb olap ne ke gos agɨl nɨŋɨd, yɨp yɨl ma owep tek lup agak. Bapi yɨp agyokak ak pen, gos tep ñek nep nɨm, yɨp yɨl apek, ñɨn kɨdek ak nop gen tepayaŋ tɨkjakɨnɨgab agak.

6.45 Ais 54.13, Jer 31.34, Mai 4.2, Hib 8.10 Bɨ God gos ñek agñeb okok, kɨli takaw anɨb ak ñu kɨl tɨkɨl agɨlak, God ne binɨb okok mɨdupsek kɨlop agñɨnɨgab agɨl tɨkɨlak agak. Anɨb ak, binɨb Bapi takaw ne ak nɨŋɨd, gos ne ñub tek nepal okok mɨdupsek, kɨli yɨp yɨl apebal agak.
6.46 Mat 11.27, Luk 10.22, Jon 1.18 Binɨb olap Bapi nop wɨdɨn ma nɨgup agak. Bɨne God ayɨp mɨdɨl owup ak nep, ne nokom Bapi nop wɨdɨn nɨgup agak.
6.47 Jon 3.15-18, 3.36, 6.40 Nɨbop nɨŋɨd yɨbɨl agebin, binɨb olap yɨp gos lɨnɨgɨnɨgab ak, pel pelnep yenɨgab agak.
6.48 Jon 6.31-35, 6.58 Yad nokom nɨm, yɨp tap mɨdup tek ñɨbɨl pel yenɨgabal ak agak.
Napɨs nased sɨkop bɨlel, man nep binɨb ma yelak nab okok mɨdɨl, tap ñɨŋeb olap, bilet Mana apal ak ñɨŋɨlak okok, kɨli mɨñɨl ma mɨdebal, pɨsnep kumɨlak agak.
Pen tap mɨdup God man ne alaŋ nɨb owak anɨb ak, binɨb ñɨbɨl ma kumnɨgel tek lup agak.

6.51 Jon 3.13, Hib 10.5, 10.10 Yad ke tap mɨdup God man ne alaŋ nɨb apɨl, binɨb okok kɨlop gen pelpel mɨdtep gebal agak. Binɨb olap tap mɨdup anɨb ak ñɨbonɨmuŋ, pel pelnep yenɨgab agak. Pen tap mɨdup nop ñɨnɨgayn ak, mubwak yad ak nep agak. Mubwak yad ak ñenɨm, binɨb man okok mɨdupsek pel mɨdtep gɨnɨgabal agak.
Jisas anɨb agek, Juda bɨawl okok kɨli takaw anɨb ak nɨŋɨd, ke nep penpen agɨl agɨlak, Bɨ nɨm awl chɨnop tɨtay dɨl mubwak ne ak ñek ñɨŋɨnɨgabun agɨlak?
Agelak Jisas kɨlop agak, Nɨbop nɨŋɨd yɨbɨl agebin agak. Nɨbi Bɨ Olap Ñɨne mubwak nop ak ñɨbɨl, nɨkɨm nop ak ñɨbɨl genɨmɨb agak. Mel ak, kɨm mɨdɨl pel mɨdtep ma gɨnɨgabɨm agak.

6.54 Jon 4.14, 6.27, 6.40, 6.63 Mubwak yad ak, tap mɨdup nɨŋɨd yɨbɨl mɨdeb agak. Nɨkɨm yad ak, tap ñɨŋeb nɨŋɨd yɨbɨl mɨdeb agak. Anɨb ak tek, binɨb olap mubwak yɨp ñɨbɨl nɨkɨm yɨp ñɨbɨl gɨnɨgab ak, pel pelnep yenɨgab agak. Pen ñɨn kɨdek ak apek, nop gen tepayaŋ tɨkjakɨnɨgab agak.
6.56 1 Jo 3.24, 4.15-16 Mubwak yɨp ñɨbɨl nɨkɨm yɨp ñɨbɨl gɨnɨgab ak, ne yad ayɨp chɨgɨl, yad pen ne ayɨp chɨgɨl, jɨmñɨl yonɨgabul agak.
6.57 Jon 15.4-5, 1 Jo 3.24 Bapi pel mɨdep ak yɨp agyokek ownek ak, yɨp gek pel mɨdtep gɨl mɨdebin agak. Anɨb ak tek, binɨb olap yɨp ñɨŋɨnɨgab ak, nop gen pel mɨdtep gɨl yenɨgab agak.

Tap mɨdup anɨb ak nɨm, God man ne alaŋ nɨb owup agak. Pen tap mɨdup anɨb ak, apɨs based sɨkop tap ñɨŋeb olap, bilet Mana apal ak ñɨbɨl, mɨd dad amɨl kumɨlak anɨb ak tek mel agak. Binɨb olap tap mɨdup yad apin ak ñɨŋɨnɨgab ak, pel pelnep yenɨgab agak.
Jisas taun Kapeneyam, Juda apnan gɨpal kal ak mɨdɨl, binɨb okok kɨlop agñɨlɨg takaw anɨb ak agak.
Jisas takaw anɨb ak agek, bɨne okok nɨŋɨd kuŋay agɨlak, Takaw anɨb ak mɨŋel gup agɨlak. An tek nɨgɨnɨgab agɨlak?
Bɨne agɨlak anɨb ak, Jisas ne ke nɨŋɨd, pomɨl agɨlak okok kɨlop agak, Takaw apin anɨb ak, nɨbop gek gos ak nepɨm ak kelɨgɨl apyap pakɨpɨm akaŋ agak?
6.62 Mak 16.19, Jon 3.13, Apo 1.9-11, Epe 4.8 Pen Bɨ Olap Ñɨne ned yek alaŋ ak, tep alaŋ adɨkɨd amenɨgab nɨŋɨd, gos tay nɨgɨnɨgabɨm agak?

6.63 2 Ko 3.6 God Kawnan ne ke gek, binɨb okok pel mɨdtep gebal agak. Mubwak ak tap yokɨp, nɨbop kɨles ñɨnɨmuŋ tek ma lup agak. Takaw yad nɨbop apin ak, God Kawnan takaw ne ak anɨb agek, nɨbop gek pel mɨdtep gebɨm agak.
6.64 Jon 6.36, 13.11 Nɨbi ogɨnap pen, yɨp gos ma lɨnepɨm agak. Pen Jisas ne ke ned mɨd dad amɨl nɨgak, binɨb an nop gos ma lɨnɨgɨnɨgabal okok, bɨ an nop chen mɨmug gɨ dad amnɨgab ak.

6.65 Jon 6.44-45 Pen takaw ogɨnap sek agɨl agak, Kɨli yɨp gos ma nepal, adek anɨb ak nep nɨbop anɨb apin, Binɨb olap gos ne ke nep nɨŋɨd, yɨp yɨl ownɨmuŋ tek ma lup apin agak. Bapi nokom nɨm nop gos ñek, yɨp yɨl ownɨmuŋ tek lup apin agak.
Jisas takaw anɨb ak agjuwek, bɨne ayɨp ajelɨgɨpal okok, kuŋay nop kelɨgɨl keke amnɨlak.
Nop kelɨg amelak, bɨne anep umɨgan ak kɨlop agnɨŋɨd agak, Nɨbi abe yɨp kelɨg amebɨm akaŋ agak?
Agek, Saymon Pita pen agak, Bɨawl, an yɨl amnɨgun agak? Takaw nad ak nep chɨnop gek, pel pelnep yonɨgabun agak.
6.69 Mat 14.33, Mak 1.24, Jon 1.49 Chɨn nep gos lɨnɨŋɨd, nɨgtep gɨl nopun, nad God bɨ suŋtep yɨbɨl ne ak mɨdeban agak.
Anɨb agek, Jisas pen agak, Nɨbop anep umɨgan ak tɨg asɨk ke lɨl dɨpin ak pen, nɨbi olap bɨ kɨcheki mɨdeb agak.
Agak anɨb ak, Judas, Saymon Yiskaliyot ñɨne ak nop agak. Judas ne bɨ anep umɨgan olap pen, kɨdek Jisas nop chen mɨmug gɨ dad amnɨgab.
